text:
[Verse]
City lights shining bright
Lost in the neon night
Faces pass blurred away
Feeling small in the fray

[Verse 2]
Crowded streets never sleep
Miles to go dreams to keep
Voices rise in the air
Finding hope everywhere

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Lost in the crowd
Heart is beating loud
Lost but yet so proud

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Wondering who am I
Whispers from the past call
But I stand ten feet tall

[Verse 4]
Music pumps alleyways
Rhythm guides while we sway
Laughter echoes around
In this place I've found

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Lost in the crowd
Heart is beating loud
Lost but yet so proud
title: Lost in the City
